en.title: Cat Eye Discharge and Tear Stain Care: Causes and Proper Treatment
en.content:
Cat eye discharge can be a normal occurrence or a sign of illness. Learn to tell the difference between normal and abnormal discharge, and how to provide proper care.

Normal Eye Discharge

A small amount of dry, brownish to dark discharge is within the normal range. A little bit at the inner corner of the eye when your cat wakes up in the morning is nothing to worry about.

Eye Discharge That May Indicate Illness

Yellow to green pus-like discharge, excessive amounts, discharge from only one eye, or redness in the eye may indicate conjunctivitis or a viral infection. Consult your veterinarian as soon as possible.

Tear Stain Prevention

Tear staining occurs when excessive tear production causes discoloration of the fur around the eyes. It is often caused by blocked tear ducts or allergies. Gently wipe the area with a moistened gauze pad or cotton ball to keep it clean.

zh.title: 猫咪眼屎与泪痕护理：原因及正确的护理方法
zh.content:
猫咪的眼屎有时是正常的生理现象，有时也可能是疾病的信号。了解正常与异常的区别，进行适当的护理。

正常的眼屎

少量干燥的茶色至深色眼屎属于正常范围。早晨醒来时眼角有少许附着物不必担心。

需要警惕的眼屎

黄色至绿色的脓状眼屎、量很多、仅出现在一只眼睛、眼睛充血的情况，可能是结膜炎或病毒感染。请尽早咨询兽医。

泪痕的护理

泪痕是由于泪液分泌过多导致眼睛周围毛发变色的状态。常见原因是鼻泪管堵塞或过敏。用湿润的纱布或棉花轻轻擦拭，保持清洁。
